README: JS and CSS needed by our mkdocs site.
`npm run init-mkdocs` will copy files to where they're needed under temper-docs/docs/ext when run in the context of docs/for-users.
The npm invocation is done by build-user-docs/build.gradle.
The scripts below has two entries.
init-mkdocs makes sure that node_modules are in the right place.
init-mkdocs then invokes the second separately.
The second uses bash expansions which fail unless node_modules exists.
